short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Front-end developer helper for specs reading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Tool helps you easily read and understand design specs.
This app allows you to select images and interpret them by using one of the super-useful tools:

Eyedropper - click on a color to know it value and add it to your list. You can switch between RGB and HEX and copy the result to clipboard.

Dimensions - just slide over your image to see dimensions of each element real-time.

Measure - select an area and this tool will tell you it's value in pixels.

More tools to come! We're constantly improving the existing tools and thinking about some cool new features to help frontend developers. 
Please, leave us feedback if you think this tool might be useful for you!
